# Reflecting on our Tools

## Evolving Interests

_This year marks a turning point for `riskmetric`_

<br>

::: { .columns } 
::: { .column }
### ğŸŒ± How it started

* A tool to support **advocacy** of the use of R
* Prefer **simplicity** of reasonable indications of quality with minimal 
  knowledge of ecosystem 
* Primary user story was for data scientists to **build a case** for what good
  software looks like
:::

::: { .column }
### ğŸŒ³ How it's going

* A tool to support **administration** of R packages
* Prefer **precise** indicators of quality, with full awareness of complexity of
  ecosystem
* Primary user story is now to **build a production-grade** R environment
:::
:::
